decision_conditions:

site_name: Garages West Side Of Turnbull House
description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2017/3493/FUL, dated 09/05/2018, for the demolition of 12 (twelve) existing garage units and removal of adjacent car parking facilities to facilitate construction of a three storey (plus basement), 11-bedroom (plus staff sleep-in unit) building to accommodate a supported living scheme (use Class C2). The proposal also includes communal kitchen/living/dining facilities, staff offices, laundry, plant room, and accessible bathroom facility. Associated landscaping including courtyard garden areas, refuse and cycle storage provision is also proposed. 

The applicant seeks to amend Condition 2 (Approved Plans) to allow for: Revisions to fenestration proposals; Addition of a low level louvred enclosure to provide ventilation to the basement; Introduction of blue roof; Addition of dry riser inlets and a gas meter enclosure to the Windsor Street elevation; Collapsible balustrade replaced with man-safe system.
